alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:08PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Putnam and southern Clay Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 208 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Picolata to Melrose. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Melrose, Bostwick, Melrose Landing, George`s Lake, Bardin, Florahome, Johnson, Putnam Hall and Carraway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
